title: Formation Métagénomique 16S March 2019 - Ravel dataset analysis
description: Analysis of the Ravel et al. (2011) dataset with R. This vignette documents and reproduces the analyses performed with FROGSSTATS during the training *Analyse de données métagénomiques 16S* that took place on March 2019

title: Formation Métagnénomique 16S March 2019 - Chaillou dataset analysis
description: Analysis of the Chaillou et al. (2015) dataset with R. This vignette documents and reproduces the analyses performed with FROGSSTATS during the training *Analyse de données métagénomiques 16S* that took place on March 2019

title: Utiliser SGE depuis R
description: Utiliser future.batchtools pour faire communiquer R et SGE directement depuis R.

title: Welcome to INRA-Migale Blog
description:
Welcome to the INRA-Migale blog. We hope you enjoy
